event_types.default: Alumni,Bachelor / Bachelorette,Birthday,Cocktail Reception,Corporate Lunch,Engagement,Fundraiser,Graduation,Holiday,Meeting / Presentation,Photo / Film Shoot,Private Dinner,Rehearsal Dinner,Shower,Sporting Event,Wedding,Other

selfhosted_woff2.title: WOFF2
selfhosted_woff2.helper: Optional. Browser Support: Chrome 36.0+, Firefox 35.0+, Opera 26.0+

selfhosted_woff.title: WOFF
selfhosted_woff.helper: Recommended. Browser Support: Chrome 5.0+, IE9+, Firefox 3.6+, Safari 5.1+, Opera 11.1+

selfhosted_ttf.title: TTF
selfhosted_ttf.helper: Recommended. Browser Support: Chrome 4.0+, IE9+, Firefox, 4.5+, Safari 3.1+, Opera 10.0+, iOS, Android

selfhosted_otf.title: OTF
selfhosted_otf.helper: Optional. Browser Support: Chrome 4.0+, IE9+, Firefox, 4.5+, Safari 3.1+, Opera 10.0+

selfhosted_style.title: Font Style
selfhosted_style.helper: Optional. Inaccurate values may cause the font to fail to load. If you are unsure, leave this blank.

selfhosted_weight.title: Font Weight
selfhosted_weight.helper: Optional. Inaccurate values may cause the font to fail to load. If you are unsure, leave this blank.
